services.subtitle: Integrated and reliable solutions for your success.

immobilier.title: Real Estate
immobilier.long: We support you from A to Z: strategic advisory, secured transactions, optimized rental management, real estate development and co-ownership management. Our team is dedicated to securing your investments and maximizing your asset value.

construction.title: Construction
construction.long: From design to completion, we handle complete project management, structural works, finishing, and renovations with rigorous oversight and international standards. We guarantee on-time delivery within agreed budgets.

import_export.title: Import / Export
import_export.short: Import/export of various goods (vehicles as a priority).
import_export.long: Specialized in international trade, we facilitate the import/export of vehicles, spare parts, and diverse goods. We manage sourcing, complete logistics, customs clearance, and delivery to final destination.

agronomie.title: Agronomy & Tourism
agronomie.short: Sustainable agricultural projects, authentic local experiences.
agronomie.long: We develop innovative and sustainable agricultural projects, from technical consulting to commercialization, while also promoting local tourism and cultural exchange. Our approach combines agronomic expertise and local heritage valorization.

about.title: About
about.lead: Altea Group is a multidisciplinary group based in Senegal, committed to excellence, transparency, and innovation across all its areas of expertise.
about.missionText: To deliver tailored and sustainable solutions in real estate, construction, import/export, and agronomy, while ensuring client satisfaction and success. We are committed to creating long-term value.
about.visionText: To become a benchmark player in West Africa through impeccable quality, professional ethics, and proximity with our partners and clients. We aspire to become the trusted partner for all your major projects.
about.teamIntro: A multidisciplinary, passionate and dedicated team combining local expertise with international standards. Each member brings their expertise to ensure excellence in our services.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to bring your projects to life?
about.ctaText: Contact us today and let's make your ambitions a reality. Our team is here to listen and support you in the success of your projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.lead: Discover our achievements and ongoing projects that showcase our expertise and commitment to excellence.

footer.description: Altea Group is a multidisciplinary group active in construction, real estate, agronomy, and import-export. We support your projects with expertise and professionalism.
